channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Pole., 3rd September
item.description:
Pole fallen out again. Someone has placed on the driveway of rainbow day nursery. Can someone please come and remove asap to avoid it falling on someone. Is this needed?

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Southborough Lane, Southborough, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Road drain continuously blocked, 3rd September
item.description:
Drain outside Piccadilly Theatre continuously blocked. Water ingress into basement bar, possible cause. Darin has been blocked for 5 months minimum since I have been working onsite. Possible cracked or broken drain causing ingress. Requires attendance and clearing. Previous Enquiry 158568 states drain unblocked but does not appear to be the case as overflow has repeated.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 18, Sherwood Street, City of Westminster
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Graffiti on front wall, 3rd September
item.description:
Graffiti with repeat tags on the front fence facing Herne Hill. There started off as one but now there are about 5 or 6 different tags.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 83, Herne Hill, Dulwich Village, London

item.title: Pavement closed meaning children are having to go in the road to walk to school, 3rd September
item.description:
It has been like this for months! Now children are having to walk in the road to and from school. Which is very dangerous during busy times.

item.title: Full bin!!!!!, 3rd September
item.description:
This is my 3rd time of reporting & after 3 months still nothing has been done about the full to the brim bins outside No 80 the bin has been sitting there overflowing with gas canisters & dirty nappies all this time bowing all over the green & pavement. Now the HMO next door seems to have joined in & they have had the same. I have to dodge around crap everytime I walk my dog past it’s disgusting & attracting vermin all because people don’t understand what rubbish goes in what bin.THIS NEEDS SORTING!!!!!!!!
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Shaw Road, Downham, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Damaged street sign x 2, 3rd September
item.description:
The street sign in pinewood avenue Hollies end is in a poor state and requires replacing on both sides. This has been reported numerous times by myself and neighbours and local councillor to no avail, I have not received a response. If no response/action this time I will put a formal complaint in to the council.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 2, Pinewood Avenue, Longlands, Sidcup, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Fence and shrubbery on pavement, 3rd September
item.description:
Fence and shrubbery covering most of the pavement. Car crashed through fence by M&S car park exit bringing the fence and the attached shrubbery with it. Now largely blocking the pavement for several days now.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Church Avenue, Beckenham, London

item.title: Underpass being used as a toilet, 3rd September
item.description:
Reported by a member of public on 29th August and on 3rd September Complaint re underpass/subway - A10 near Bullsmoor recently over the last year the subway by the a10 near Bullsmoor has been disgusting there is a drug dealer on manor farm road which is causing lots more "crackheads" to hang around the area especially the underpass they are now using it as a toilet and I can stand a little bit of wee but human excrement is another thing there's always piles of it down there and soon when the kids go to school that subway is used so often it's not safe ever under there and people will start to walk across the road which may cause accident with cars or people no one wants to walk past a pile of human waste I feel sorry for the people that have to clean it up and I know they do clean the subway because I have seen them but what's the point in cleaning it one day then the next a person decides to take a **** down there humans are disgusting Kinda regards manor farm residents
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Bullsmoor Lane, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Drain is blocked once again, 3rd September
item.description:
The drain is once again blocked … My mum is wheelchair user and disabled and we are getting soaked when getting in and out of the car

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Mayplace Road East, Barnehurst, London
